title: Customer Authentication and Access Security
summary: Implement secure multi-factor authentication and login controls for banking portal users.
description: Develop and enforce secure user authentication practices including multi-factor authentication (MFA), password encryption, and device-based security. Implement adaptive security measures to detect suspicious login attempts and account access. Provide mechanisms for secure password recovery and session management. The goal is to protect user accounts, financial data, and personal information while complying with industry standards such as PCI-DSS and GDPR.

title: Personalized Banking Dashboard
summary: Design a personalized, real-time dashboard to display customer financial information and services.
description: Create a dynamic and user-specific dashboard showing account balances, transaction summaries, and personalized product recommendations. Integrate backend APIs to display real-time updates and customer-specific opportunities such as eligible loans, account upgrades, and promotional offers. Ensure the dashboard layout is modular, customizable, and intuitive, allowing users to view and manage banking data seamlessly.

title: Responsive Multi-Device Interface
summary: Deliver a unified, responsive interface for customers to access banking services across all devices.
description: Develop a responsive web and mobile experience that maintains consistent performance and usability across desktops, tablets, and smartphones. Implement modern UI standards including accessibility compliance, mobile optimization, and adaptive layouts. Prioritize usability for key actions such as transfers, bill payments, and service requests, ensuring all users receive an efficient experience on their preferred device.

title: Digital Account Onboarding and Self-Service Requests
summary: Enable end-to-end online account onboarding and service modification requests.
description: Implement guided self-service workflows for account opening, product subscriptions, and service changes. Automate customer verification, KYC validation, eligibility checks, and data entry using built-in intelligence. Ensure integration with internal compliance systems and allow customers to authenticate and complete their requests digitally without branch intervention. Provide users with progress visibility at each stage of request processing.

title: Save and Resume Applications
summary: Allow customers to save incomplete applications and resume them later without re-entering data.
description: Create functionality for users to save their progress on forms or account applications and resume them from any device upon secure login. Implement encryption for stored partial data, automatic progress saving, and expiration management for pending requests. Send reminders about incomplete processes and enhance customer convenience through recovery links and progress tracking dashboards.

title: Secure Document Upload and Verification
summary: Allow customers to upload and verify required documents safely as part of enquiry or onboarding workflows.
description: Develop a secure document upload feature where customers can submit KYC and supporting documents. Ensure encryption in transit and at rest, validate file formats, and scan for malicious uploads. Integrate backend review and verification workflows to confirm accuracy. Provide customers feedback on document acceptance, rejection, or additional requirements while ensuring traceability through document tagging and storage audit.

title: Real-Time Request Status Tracking and Notifications
summary: Provide customers with real-time updates and alerts on application and service statuses.
description: Implement real-time tracking for customer-initiated requests and applications, allowing them to monitor progress via the dashboard. Integrate email and SMS notifications to keep customers informed of status changes, approvals, or rejections. The system should support push notifications and alerts within the portal to improve transparency and trust throughout customer interactions.

title: Customer Activity History and Audit Trail
summary: Maintain a comprehensive record of customer interactions for compliance and transparency.
description: Build an immutable audit log that records customer actions including logins, transactions, uploaded documents, and modifications. Ensure timestamping, encryption, and secure storage of all audit entries in accordance with banking compliance standards. Develop a dashboard for customers to view their interaction history, while providing detailed view logs for auditors and administrators to support monitoring and governance.

title: Core Banking System Integration Layer
summary: Integrate the customer portal with the bank’s core systems for real-time processing.
description: Implement secure and scalable API integrations between the self-service portal and the bank’s core banking systems. Use middleware to handle real-time data synchronization, transaction validation, and service status updates. Ensure high availability, error handling, and compliance with data governance policies. The integration must maintain consistency, performance, and reliability while handling concurrent customer requests.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) and Permissions Management
summary: Control access to portal functions and data based on roles and authorization levels.
description: Develop a role-based access control framework that defines privileges for customers, support agents, and administrators. Implement fine-grained permission settings, ensuring that users have access only to features relevant to their profiles. Integrate RBAC with authentication mechanisms for consistency and maintain full access change logs for security compliance and auditing purposes.

title: Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Establish a scalable database architecture and optimize performance for portal reliability.
description: Deploy a dedicated, high-performance database to manage user data and service workflows independent of legacy systems. Implement query optimization, caching mechanisms, and real-time performance monitoring to ensure responsiveness. Encrypt sensitive data, automate backup and disaster recovery processes, and include predictive scaling for handling peak operations to maintain system uptime and reliability.
